title: Hi, I'm Veni Mitev
subtitle: Full Stack Web Developer | Product Manager | Photographer

aboutMe.paragraphOne: Welcome to my web developer portfolio! I am a skilled web developer with a passion for creating innovative solutions that exceed user expectations. I have a Professional Certificate in Full Stack Development with MERN Stack from Massachusetts Institute of Technology. With experience in product management and CMS support, I have a deep understanding of how to develop and deliver high-quality products that meet business goals.
aboutMe.paragraphTwo: With experience in product management, CMS support, and event coordination, I have a versatile skill set that allows me to take on a range of projects. When I'm not coding, you can often find me exploring off-the-beaten-path destinations, capturing life's moments through my photography and videography skills, and volunteering in nature conservation and wildlife rehabilitation efforts. I believe in using my skills to make a positive impact in the world and contribute to the betterment of our planet.
aboutMe.paragraphThree: Please take a look at my portfolio to see some of the projects I've worked on, and feel free to reach out if you have any questions or if you'd like to collaborate on a project together.
